member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPictureViewer
member.summary:
Web Picture Viewer Control - ASP.NET 2.x+ Server Control. Automatically displays pictures attached to a record. The following Form Component Input Properties are available for this control and are also available as properties on the control.
FileExtensions: Comma-Delimited List of File Extensions to Check. If left blank, defaults to JPG, BMP, GIF, PNG. Set to the value * to allow all file types. The associated control property is implemented as a generic list of strings, the Form Component Input Property is a comma delimited string.
AttachmentCategory: Name of the attachment category to use for the files. This defaults to blank. This category of attachments is used for viewing/storage of picture attachments associated with the record. If not specified, attachments associated with NO category are used.
ScaleImage: Defaults to True - if set to True, this will result in images automatically being sized to fit the display area available in the control, otherwise, the image is displayed in its native size and scroll bars are shown if necessary
MaintainAspectRatio: Defaults to True - This property is ONLY used if ScaleImage = True - if set to True, this property will ensure that the ratio of height/width on the image is maintained as it is sized to fit the container.
BorderStyle: Defaults to Fixed3D - Options are None, Fixed3D, and FixedSingle - corresponds to the standard UserControl BorderStyle property
ShowToolbar: Defaults to True
